mention.text: a '' political pope '' pursuing a leftist agenda that castigates capitalism and environmental degradation
Mr. Trump '' is not Christian '' in answering a reporter 's question on his return flight from Mexico
the leader of a populism that 's growing : a cultural industry that has imitators in many countries in Eastern Europe , above all , but also in France , Italy , Denmark , Scandinavia
irresistible : Pope Francis , leader of the world 's 1.2 billion Roman Catholics
the first days of his papacy
the border of Mexico and the United States on Wednesday
His critics in the United States
the United States-Mexico border as a favor
a surprise to the Mexican government , judging from Francis ' six-day swing through the country
a columnist for the Italian newspaper Corriere della Sera
the excesses of capitalism , yet Vatican officials emphasized on Friday that the pope was not personally attacking Mr. Trump , nor trying to influence American voters
the city of Nineveh , which was '' self-destructing as a result of oppression and dishonor , violence and injustice
